subject: Cricket (Game)
Apartheid (Policy)
Deaths (Obituaries)
Race and Ethnicity
Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: Mr. D’Oliveira’s struggles to become a high-level cricket player in a country of government-enforced racial segregation became a powerful symbol in the ultimately successful fight against apartheid.
snippet: Mr. D’Oliveira’s struggles to become a high-level cricket player in a country of government-enforced racial segregation became a powerful symbol in the ultimately successful fight against apartheid.
